en.name: Lead from a place of love
en.description: Connect with your inner voice and intuition.

stations.alias: Meditation: Lead from a place of love

sections.alias: Leading from a place of love
sections.title: Leading from a place of love
sections.content:
*6 minutes*

Find your way to holding and working with feelings of shame and inadequacy by embodying The Compassionate Observer. This meditations helps you lean in to your authentic self and lead from a place of love.

*Guided by Rachel Brathen (Yoga Girl), based on research, co-created by Ph.D F. Livheim.*

sections.title: Meditation
sections.alias: Audio: lead from a place of love

sections.title: Well done!
sections.content:
Well done for completing this meditation.

Now matter how challenging the circumstances, you already have all you need to be a force of good in this world.

sections.alias: sharing wall lead from a place of love
sections.question: How did you feel while doing this meditation?
sections.exampleText: Strange, but I really felt loved by myself. Does not happen too often.

stations.name: Lead from a place of love

sv.name: Ledande från en plats av kärlek
sv.description: Anslut med din inre röst och intuition.

stations.alias: Meditation: Lead from a place of love

sections.alias: Ledande från en plats av kärlek
sections.title: Ledande från en plats av kärlek
sections.content:
* 05: 05 minuter *

Denna meditation hjälper dig att luta dig mot ditt autentiska jag och leda från en plats med kärlek.

sections.title: Bra gjort!
sections.content:
Bra gjort för att slutföra denna meditation.

Oavsett hur utmanande omständigheterna har, har du redan allt du behöver för att vara en god kraft i denna värld.

stations.name: Ledande från en plats av kärlek

pt.name: Guia-te a partir de um lugar de amor
pt.description: Conecta-te com a tua voz interior e com a tua intuição.

stations.alias: Meditation: Lead from a place of love

sections.alias: Guia-te a partir de um lugar de amor
sections.title: Guia-te a partir de um lugar de amor
sections.content:
*05:12 minutos*

Esta meditação ajuda-te a apoiares-te no teu eu verdadeiro e a guiares-te a partir de um lugar de amor.

sections.title: Parabéns!
sections.content:
Parabéns por concluíres esta meditação.

Agora, tens tudo para fazer o bem neste mundo independentemente de quão desafiantes sejam as situações.

sections.alias: sharing wall lead from a place of love
sections.question: Como te sentiste ao fazer esta meditação?
sections.exampleText: Estranha/o, mas senti amor por mim própria/o. O que não acontece frequentemente.

stations.name: Guia-te a partir de um lugar de amor
